name: RandomService_nextLongTest
description: Unit tests for the nextLong method of the RandomService class.

test_cases.name: testNextLongWithPositiveBound
test_cases.description: Tests the nextLong method with a positive bound, ensuring the result is within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testNextLongWithBoundOne
test_cases.description: Tests the nextLong method with a bound of 1, ensuring the result is 0.

test_cases.name: testNextLongWithNonPositiveBound
test_cases.description: Tests the nextLong method with non-positive bounds, ensuring an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
